00032 template <typename _State, typename _Signal, typename _Cost = float>
00033 class Signaller
00034 {
00035 public:
00036     typedef _State state_type;   
00037     typedef _Signal signal_type; 
00038     typedef _Cost cost_type;     
00039 
00040     Signaller(){}
00041     ~Signaller(){}
00042 
00044     void            Reset() { totalCost = static_cast<_Cost>(0); }
00045     inline void     Randomise(int numStates, int numSignals);
00046 
00048     void            PushCost()          { totalCost += GetCost(); }
00049 
00051     _State          GetState()const     { return state; }
00053     _Signal         GetSignal()const    { return signals.find(state)->second; }
00055     _Signal         GetSignal(_State s)const { return signals.find(s)->second; }
00057     _Cost           GetCost()const      { return costs.find(state)->second.find(GetSignal())->second; }
00059     static _Cost    GetCost(_State st, _Signal si) { return costs[st][si]; }
00061     _Cost           GetTotalCost()const { return totalCost; }
00062 
00064     void            SetState(_State s)  { state = s; }
00066     void            SetSignal(_State st, _Signal si) { signals[st] = si; }
00068     static void     SetCost(_State st, _Signal si, _Cost co) { costs[st][si] = co; }
00069 
00070 private:
00071     _Cost           totalCost;          
00072 
00073     _State state;                       
00074     std::map<_State, _Signal> signals;  
00075 
00077     static typename std::map<_State, std::map<_Signal, _Cost> > costs;
00078 };
00079 
00080 template <typename _State, typename _Signal, typename _Cost>
00081 typename std::map<_State, std::map<_Signal, _Cost> > 
00082 Signaller<_State, _Signal, _Cost>::costs = std::map<_State, std::map<_Signal, _Cost> >();
00083 
00088 template <typename _State, typename _Signal, typename _Cost>
00089 void Signaller<_State, _Signal, _Cost>::Randomise(int numStates, int numSignals)
00090 {
00091     using namespace std;
00092 
00093     signals.clear();
00094 
00095     for (int i=0; i<numStates; ++i) {
00096         signals[static_cast<_State>(i)] = static_cast<_Signal>(irand(numSignals));
00097     }
00098 
00099     state = static_cast<_State>(irand(numStates));
00100 }

00107 template <typename _State, typename _Signal, typename _Cost = float>
00108 class EvalNearestSignal : public EvalNearest
00109 {
00110 public:
00111     EvalNearestSignal(WorldObject* o, double range):EvalNearest(o, range){}
00112     virtual ~EvalNearestSignal(){}
00113 
00118     virtual double GetOutput()const
00119     {
00120         Signaller<_State, _Signal, _Cost>* s;
00121         if (IsKindOf(bestCandidate, s)) {
00122             return static_cast<double>(s->GetSignal());
00123         }
00124         return 0.0;
00125     }
00126 };
00127 
00135 template <class T>
00136 Sensor* NearestSignalSensor(int highestSignal)
00137 {
00138     Sensor* s = new Sensor(Vector2D(0.0, 0.0), 0.0);
00139     s->SetMatchingFunction(new MatchKindOf<T>);
00140     s->SetEvaluationFunction(new EvalNearestSignal<typename T::state_type, 
00141                                                    typename T::signal_type,
00142                                                    typename T::cost_type>(s, 1000.0));
00143     s->SetScalingFunction(new ScaleLinear(0.0, static_cast<double>(highestSignal), -1.0, 1.0));
00144     
00145     return s;
00146 }
